document.author: JulSa_
document.text: Avec un peu de retard, voici la mise à jour du PlayStation Store du 14 septembre 2011. Au programme vous trouverez la démo de FIFA 12 et PES 2012 . Vous allez donc pouvoir comparer les deux. Mais n’oubliez pas qu’une démo n’est pas le reflet d’un jeu terminé 😉 Voici la liste complète : PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Contenu PlayStation Plus Renegade Ops – 20% de reduction avec l’offre PLAY (jusqu’au 21 septembre) From Dust – 20% de réduction (une semaine seulement) Alpha Mission (SNK minis) – 20% de réduction Essai et déblocage (PS3) Renegade Ops (12.99 €) Ce produit est gratuit pour ceux qui les précommandes de l’offre PLAY Rating: PEGI 12 (USK 16) From Dust (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Jeux complets (PS3) Bulletstorm (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Bodycount (49.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Fast Draw Showdown (9.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell Trilogy HD (39.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War Collection: Volume II (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War HD Collection: Volume II (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War: Chains of Olympus HD (17.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War: Ghost of Sparta HD (17.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 minis (PS3 et PSP ) Arcade Essentials Evolution (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Revoltin’ Youth (1.99 €) (nouvelle publication) Rating: PEGI 3 Alpha Mission (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Ikari Warriors (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Démos (PS3) Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Rating: PEGI 16 FIFA 12 Rating: PEGI 3 PES 2012 – Pro Evolution Soccer Rating: PEGI 3 Add-On Game Content (PS3) Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 3 – Extra Set of Mobile Suits 5 (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Dynasty Warriors 7 Original Costume Pack 4 (4.99 €) Stage 3 Pack (3.99 €) Weapon Rank Pack 2 (1.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer – Medieval Pack (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Yoostar 2 American Wolf Man in London (1.75 €) Desert Fire (1.75 €) Friend: Good! (1.75 €) True Family (1.75 €) Ride the Griffin! (1.75 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité: non disponible en Belgique Section 8: Prejudice – Frontier Colonies Map Pack (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012 – Magic 2012 Expansion (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Avatars EyePet Piggy Pet (0.25 €) Wizard Pet (0.25 €) Knight Pet (0.25 €) Fast Draw Showdown Angry Cowboy (0.25 €) Classic Cowboy (0.25 €) Cowboy with Horse (0.25 €) Crazy Cowboy (0.25 €) Logo (0.25 €) Wes Flowers – A (0.25 €) Wes Flowers – B (0.25 €) Renegade Ops – Bryant Avatar (0.25 €) Thèmes (PS3) TV/Films Warner Bro’s ‘Horrible Bosses’ Theme (Espagne) Thèmes dynamiques( PS3 ) Abstrait Dynamic Squares Theme (1.99 €) P90 Theme (1.99 €) Jeux Fast Draw Showdown Dynamic Theme (0.99 €) Nature Great Beach Theme (1.99 €) Great Dawn Theme (1.99 €) Lightning In Night Sky Theme (1.99 €) Vidéos (PS3) God of War: Game Directors Live Renegade Ops Launch Trailer Wrecked: Revenge Revisited Weapons PEGI Trailer Assassin’s Creed: Revelations Announcement Trailer Armageddon Riders Gameplay Video The Baconing Character Trailer Cinematic Trailer Launch Trailer
